about.about: Streets is a web client application for Nostr. As it is currently under development, unexpected bugs or significant feature changes may occur. Please use it at your own risk, and we greatly appreciate any feedback you can provide!
about.author: author
about.contributors: ...And many of our contributors! Thank you for your support!
about.title: About Streets

file.help: You can select a server to upload files such as images when posting.
file.title: File

mute.needLogin: You need to log in to set mute
mute.title: Mute

privacy.accessAnalysisToolDescription:
This app uses access analysis tools provided by third parties for the purpose of service improvement.

With access analysis tools, information on pages viewed and device information is sent to a third party and analyzed. 
This data is collected anonymously and does not personally identify you.

Please see below for the provider name of the access analysis tool used in this app, information collected, purpose of use, privacy policy, and opt-out method.
privacy.gaInformationProvided: User ID, cookies, device information, behavior history on the site
privacy.title: Privacy policy
privacy.useOfAccessAnalysisTools: Regarding the use of access analysis tools

profile.lightningAddressHelp:
Used to receive chips using Bitcoin. 
By entering your Lightning address or LNURL address, you will be able to receive tips from other users.
profile.needLogin: You need to log in to set your profile
profile.nip05Help: The Nostr address is used to link your domain and account. It is used for user identification and search.
profile.title: Profile

relay.relayHelp: A relay is a server where users' posts and reactions are stored. Your posts and reactions are saved to the relay set as 'Write'. Other people's posts and reactions are retrieved from the relay set as 'Read'.
relay.title: Relay
